entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from Indian authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, chief ministers, other state and central Ministers and public health authorities across India. For more, visit https://www.mohfw.gov.in/

text:
Had an extensive meeting with CMs. Each CM shared their perspective on battling COVID-19. 

We discussed the way ahead in the post-COVID era, the challenges in healthcare, education and other sectors. https://t.co/0SZptVbzAF
